Name: Nightcrawler VR Bowling
About the game: A bowling game for city slickers who like the night life vibes. Keeps track of your score adding extra points for strikes and spares. Reset at any time. Features - Realistic bowling arena with true-to-life alley and pin/ball sizes - Sound effects of the city and the ball striking pins/rolling across floor - Score tracking lets you see how many pins you knocked down - See your final score at the end - Reset game at any time
